## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledagsdnodes">ScheduleDAGSDNodes</a> - A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag">ScheduleDAG</a> for scheduling SDNode-based DAGs.

Edges between SUnits are initially based on edges in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a>, and additional edges can be added by the schedulers as heuristics. SDNodes such as Constants, Registers, and a few others that are not interesting to schedulers are not allocated SUnits.

SDNodes with MVT::Glue operands are grouped along with the flagged nodes into a single <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> so that they are scheduled together.

SDNode-based scheduling graphs do not use <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a07333f8ba53e0454b7ec6365860c0732abe9561936346ab5c5e22fe544994b06e">SDep::Anti</a> or <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a07333f8ba53e0454b7ec6365860c0732a011a1d87822a7f70efee9e430a7ccc36">SDep::Output</a> edges. Physical register dependence information is not carried in the DAG and must be handled explicitly by schedulers.

Definition at line 46 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagsdnodes-h">ScheduleDAGSDNodes.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### BuildSchedGraph() {#aa88c65a5abb5774125c8d66a48d07adf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void ScheduleDAGSDNodes::BuildSchedGraph ()">
BuildSchedGraph - Build the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> graph from the selection dag that we are input.

This <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> graph is similar to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a>, but excludes nodes that aren&#39;t interesting to scheduling, and represents flagged together nodes with a single <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a>.

This <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> graph is similar to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a>, but excludes nodes that aren&#39;t interesting to scheduling, and represents glued together nodes with a single <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagsdnodes-h/#l00097">97</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagsdnodes-h">ScheduleDAGSDNodes.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagsdnodes-cpp/#l00539">539</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagsdnodes-cpp">ScheduleDAGSDNodes.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### EmitSchedule() {#a6f60ed03227dbeb711a3ae9b1f0238e9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineBasicBlock &#42; ScheduleDAGSDNodes::EmitSchedule (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp; InsertPos)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
EmitSchedule - Insert MachineInstrs into the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> according to the order specified in Sequence.

EmitSchedule - Emit the machine code in scheduled order.

Return the new InsertPos and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> that contains this insertion point. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledagsdnodes">ScheduleDAGSDNodes</a> holds a BB pointer for convenience, but this does not necessarily refer to returned BB. The emitter may split blocks.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagsdnodes-h/#l00123">123</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagsdnodes-h">ScheduleDAGSDNodes.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagsdnodes-cpp/#l00852">852</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagsdnodes-cpp">ScheduleDAGSDNodes.cpp</a>.

### ClusterNeighboringLoads() {#ac68008eebc8d4076dd5202efa3a15948}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void ScheduleDAGSDNodes::ClusterNeighboringLoads (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42; Node)</>}>
ClusterNeighboringLoads - Cluster loads from &quot;near&quot; addresses into combined SUnits.

ClusterNeighboringLoads - Force nearby loads together by &quot;gluing&quot; them.

This function finds loads of the same base and different offsets. If the offsets are not far apart (target specific), it add MVT::Glue inputs and outputs to ensure they are scheduled together and in order. This optimization may benefit some targets by improving cache locality.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagsdnodes-h/#l00178">178</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagsdnodes-h">ScheduleDAGSDNodes.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagsdnodes-cpp/#l00204">204</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagsdnodes-cpp">ScheduleDAGSDNodes.cpp</a>.
